name: Light of Darkness (knh190)
description:
Light of Darkness

Time is visible. 5 minutes walking simulator. Explore the four different time scales in the room.

This is the No.1 of my five minutes game project.

Control

References

Fonts: Fira Code, Rubik Mono.
